summary: [i]Custom Sigils[/i] is a quick and easy way for [b][i]you[/i][/b] to make your own heraldry and use it in Skyrim on a house/faction shield. - Basically it's a simple modding toolkit.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]While I wholeheartedly endorse valve I do not endorse the upload of my mods to SteamWorkshop, please respect this decision.[/color]
Special thanks to these mod authors for their permission to use their work:
- Backsteppo - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387]Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit (Linen Cloak Model)[/url]
- Zenl - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11784]Berserk Black Swordsman Armor (Hide Cloak Model)[/url]
- Nikinoodles - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim (foundation concept and legwork)[/url]

Please show your support.


[size=5]Description:[/size]
[i]Custom Sigils[/i] is a DIY (Do it yourself) mod and a quick and easy way for [b][i]you[/i][/b] to make your own heraldry and use it in Skyrim on house/faction shields and cloaks.
Basically it's a simple modding toolkit consisting of: pre-made craftable items and tempering recipe, photoshop templates, tutorials, and examples.
[u]Completely compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url] & [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming (+cloak patch)[/url][/u]

Note: to ensure followers will carry the item you give them, install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url], and use the 'you could dress better' command.
Note: colours in game appear brighter and more vibrant than the photoshop/texture artwork. (Use the "skyrim swatches" layer as a colour guide)


===== To make your own logo you will need:
- Photoshop [url=http://www.adobe.com/cfusion/tdrc/index.cfm?product=photoshop]free trial here[/url]
- [url=http://www.nvidia.com/content/devzone/index.html]photoshop DDS plugin[/url]
OR
- [url=http://www.gimp.org]GIMP[/url] (Free and opens PSD files, but i've never used it so can't offer help)
- [url=http://code.google.com/p/gimp-dds]GIMP DDS plugin[/url]

Youtube Review: [url=http://youtu.be/F4Jwm1LUuxE?t=34m33s]Skyrim Mod Sanctuary : 2012 Anniversary Edition part 4[/url]
Youtube Review: [url=http://youtu.be/ZWE_QqLVF50?t=8m36s]Skyrim Mod Sanctuary 38[/url]
Youtube Review: [url=http://youtu.be/9Ma2YuqlSDI?t=48s]Skyrim Mod Sanctuary 38 : Encore Presentation[/url]
Youtube Review: [url=http://youtu.be/gflis0avM_w?t=2m29s]Lets Play Skyrim: Dawnguard - Part 19[/url]

Basic texture overview
[youtube]6gldPdS1tZE[/youtube]
PhotoShop Tutorial  [Sorry for the terrible audio on this one :'(
[youtube]HDXoChscgCo[/youtube]

Paint.Net Tutorial by [url=https://youtu.be/GeGIWpkfMDg]Toggle AI[/url]
[youtube]GeGIWpkfMDg[/youtube]


===== News & updates
- [color=cyan]Now opensource[/color] ON ONE CONDITION; that you pay it forward by answering a few questions in my comments
- Cloaks are ready! Download the extra core files needed and start getting creative.
- Currently there are no pre-made/optional sigils for cloaks, i might work on it if people show interest (people seem happy with their own at the mo.
- I expect whinging about the multiple eps files but I am already considering just combining it all into one.


===== Future updates:
- I WONT be doing shields for Glass, Ebony, Iron, etc. Because I don't imagine it'll look that good and it's a lot of effort.


===== Crafting:
- Cloaks are found at the tanning rack under "leather"
- Linen cloak needs 1x Linen wrap. Hide cloak needs 1x leather.
- The House Shield only needs [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21037-1-1343491202.jpg]1 leather strip, 1 iron ingot, 2 firewood[/url]
- The base armor rating is 22 (same as banded shield) BUT it has the same value (40) and weighs as much as the guard shield (3).
- It is a 'light' class shield (as per a requests) this does not match the vanilla guard shields but makes more sense. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21162][Try: Guard Shields Light][/url]


===== Optional downloads (Shields only at this stage):
65 pre-made HD sigils, and accompanying photoshop templates so they can be edited [b][i]as you see fit.[/i][/b]
- 6 faction sigils from Skyrim
- 9 "Game of Thrones" house sigils (accurate to the TV series)
- 50 lore-friendly Skyrim achivement sigils.
- Clan Stiv pack: "Long Live Stiv!"


===== Installation:
- Start by downloading the main "Custom Sigils - Core" file for shields and/or cloaks.
- Install the core components (copy the files to your skyrim/data folder)
- This alone will give you the ability to craft the items which will have a default painted sigil of a black band right-to-left on white.

===== Customization:
- Replace the default texture with one of your choosing, either from the optional downloads or a personally created one using the templates
- shield found in: datatexturesarmorcustomsigilcustomsigil.dds
- cloak found in: datatexturesclothescustomsigilcustomsigilCloak-hide.dds AND customsigilCloak-linen.dds

===== Useful links and inspiration:
[url=http://thenounproject.com]thenounproject.com[/url] free vector icons
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charge_(heraldry)]wiki/Charge_(heraldry)[/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tincture_(heraldry)]wiki/Tincture_(heraldry)[/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attitude_(heraldry)]wiki/Attitude_(heraldry)[/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lion_(heraldry)]wiki/Lion_(heraldry)[/url]
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eagle_(heraldry)]wiki/Eagle_(heraldry)[/url]
Note: Vector files can be saved from wiki as .svg files and opened in illustrator
author: Hoax2
